intro.description: In this step, you will create a project containing the DaoJones runtime.

item.title: Create Java project
item.description: Switch to the Java Perspective. Select File > New > Java Project. Enter "TaskExample" in the Name field. Leave the default settings and click Finish.

item.title: Add DaoJones Project Nature
item.description:
To include the DaoJones runtime into the Build Path and create some necessary project resources, right-click on the project and select DaoJones > Enable DaoJones Project Nature.
Disable the view filter DaoJones Artifacts to see the changes that were made to the project.

item.title: Configure workspace settings
item.description: In the Window menu, select Preferences. In the dialog, search for the path DaoJones > Workbench. If you do not want the DaoJones console to appear, deselect the Show when Bean Builder is running option.
